asset.author: Dirt Devil
asset.hookText:
Link to video: https://youtu.be/e-8uF1y8R-0

Make hard floors easier with 3 modes of cleaning. This all-in-one steam & spray mop uses a steam mode to help cover grime. And its spray mode covers quick cleanups and spills. For even more power, use both modes at the same time for tough, sticky messes. Cover baseboards and corners with flexible edges then swivel to turn around tables and more. When you’re through, toss the pad in the wash for long-lasting use. If you have any questions or concerns, contact us at Facebook.com/DirtDevil, tweet us @DirtDevil, or give us a call at 800-321-1134.
